https://tmrev.io/movie/28376-Bill Bailey's Remarkable Guide to the Orchestra 2022-11-27
xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/28376-Bill Bailey's Remarkable Guide to the Orchestra 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/8xIILfDvMdCzqsOt1yNiTsTTXYg.jpg The show, recorded at London's magnificent Royal Albert Hall, is Bill's own hilarious and irreverent guide to the sounds, styles, and instruments of the orchestra, with a wide and eclectic range of subjects, including music for '70s cop shows, sci-fi films, horror movies, news themes, plus some of Bill's own songs re-imagined for an orchestra, and including Anne's own specially written new works. Bill Bailey's Remarkable Guide to the Orchestra
